ygData.subject: Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I m trying to find a good place to hunt to get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order. Like can I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place to hunt to
get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order.
Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing the other
parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is there..
does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried that I will
hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be banished to zone
beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do the higher
lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
Any suggestions?
luv,
-Su
